alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued September 17 at 4:18PM MDT until September 17 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Dust Advisory for... West central Hidalgo County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 417 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Steins and the Lordsburg Playa, along I-10, west of Lordsburg, New Mexico. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar and web cameras. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 4 and 26. Locations impacted include... Steins, Lordsburg, Road Forks, Lordsburg Playa, and Shakespeare. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
